name: Roc Wong
description: As a full stack developer with 10 years+ experience, Roc is able to deliver end to end website solutions for you, from cutting edge CSS tricks to high performance server infrastructure.

featuredProjects.name: Area51
featuredProjects.description: The Area51 team was looking for something different. They wanted something fast, something that would set them apart from other New Zealand retailers, and I worked hard to deliver what is one of New Zealandâ€™s fastest eCommerce sites. Pages load in less than a second using the latest single page app technology, meaning customers can find what they want and buy quicker.

sideProjects.name: Do Less
sideProjects.description: Do Less is a open source, companion app for the native Reminders app on iOS, by which you could choose the three most important tasks to do at a time. Do Less helps you focus and accomplish more by doing less.
